description:
I thought I would tell someone words that would describe what I like to do.
Basically I love life and I love living life. I enjoy the outdoors, traveling, restaurants, laughing, music, 
and socializing with quality people. open mind, spontaneity, sharing simplicity, respect, down to earth (however fantasy is also very important)

If you’d like to know more say “hi”.

I didn’t reaveal a lot about my self for you to read on purpose. Rather we chat, talk, engage in conversation to get to know each other more and better.
